user.title: Set up Deye Cloud Control
user.description: Enter your Deye Cloud credentials. You can obtain your App ID and App Secret from the [Deye Cloud Developer Portal](https://developer.deyecloud.com/app).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Deye Cloud API
error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Check your App ID, App Secret, email, and password

abort.already_configured: This Deye Cloud Control account is already configured
